languages.text: {n}Сенешаль напряженно морщится.{/n} "Этот голос... Я где-то его слышал? Да нет, не может быть. Простите, Лорд-капитан, показалось".
{n}Abelard wrinkles his face tentatively.{/n} "That voice... Does it sound familiar? No, why would it? Forgive me, Lord Captain. I am hearing things."
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль напряженно морщится.{/n} "Этот голос... Я где-то его слышал? Да нет, не может быть. Простите, Лорд-капитан, показалось".

traits.locale_text: {n}The seneschal wrinkles his face tentatively.{/n} "This voice... Does it sound familiar? No, this cannot be. Forgive me, Lord Captain, I am hearing things."

{n}Abelard wrinkles his face tentatively.{/n} "That voice... Does it sound familiar? No, why would it? Forgive me, Lord Captain. I am hearing things."
{n}Abelard wrinkles his face tentatively.{/n} "That voice... Does it sound familiar? No, why would it? Forgive me, Lord Captain. I am hearing things."

languages.text: {n}Abelard arruga el gesto tentativamente.{/n} «Esa voz... ¿me resulta familiar? No, ¿por qué iba a serlo? Discúlpeme, Lord Capitán. Oigo cosas».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard wrinkles his face tentatively.{/n} "That voice... Does it sound familiar? No, why would it? Forgive me, Lord Captain. I am hearing things."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard arruga el gesto tentativamente.{/n} «Esa voz... ¿me resulta familiar? No, ¿por qué iba a serlo? Discúlpeme, Lord Capitán. Oigo cosas».

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头，若有所思。{/n}“刚刚的声音……听起来好像有些耳熟？不，这怎么可能呢？抱歉，舰长大人，可能是我的错觉。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard wrinkles his face tentatively.{/n} "That voice... Does it sound familiar? No, why would it? Forgive me, Lord Captain. I am hearing things."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头，若有所思。{/n}“刚刚的声音……听起来好像有些耳熟？不，这怎么可能呢？抱歉，舰长大人，可能是我的错觉。”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは控えめに顔をしかめる。{/n}「あの声…どこかで聞いたことないか？いや、そんなはずはないよな？なんでもありません、ロード・キャプテン。空耳のようです」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard wrinkles his face tentatively.{/n} "That voice... Does it sound familiar? No, why would it? Forgive me, Lord Captain. I am hearing things."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは控えめに顔をしかめる。{/n}「あの声…どこかで聞いたことないか？いや、そんなはずはないよな？なんでもありません、ロード・キャプテン。空耳のようです」

languages.text: {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils avec hésitation.{/n} « Cette voix... J'ai comme l'impression de l'avoir déjà entendue quelque part... Mais non, je dois faire erreur. Veuillez m'excuser, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mon imagination me joue des tours. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard wrinkles his face tentatively.{/n} "That voice... Does it sound familiar? No, why would it? Forgive me, Lord Captain. I am hearing things."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils avec hésitation.{/n} « Cette voix... J'ai comme l'impression de l'avoir déjà entendue quelque part... Mais non, je dois faire erreur. Veuillez m'excuser, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mon imagination me joue des tours. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard, tereddütle yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Bu ses... Sanki tanıdık geliyor. Fakat neden tanıdık gelsin ki? Bağışlayın Lord Kaptan. Gaipten sesler duyuyor olmalıyım."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard wrinkles his face tentatively.{/n} "That voice... Does it sound familiar? No, why would it? Forgive me, Lord Captain. I am hearing things."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, tereddütle yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Bu ses... Sanki tanıdık geliyor. Fakat neden tanıdık gelsin ki? Bağışlayın Lord Kaptan. Gaipten sesler duyuyor olmalıyım."

languages.text: {n}Abelard runzelt zögernd die Stirn.{/n} "Diese Stimme ... Klingt sie vertraut? Nein, warum sollte sie? Verzeiht mir, Lord Captain. Ich höre schon Dinge."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard wrinkles his face tentatively.{/n} "That voice... Does it sound familiar? No, why would it? Forgive me, Lord Captain. I am hearing things."
